abstract: Luc Sante reviews photography books O, Write My Name: American Portraits, Harlem Heroes by Darryl Pickney, Beaton: Photographs by Mark Holborn, Frida Kahlo: The Gisele Freund Photographs by Gisele Freund, Stories by Guillermo Srodek-Hart, The Lost Tribes of Tierra del Fuego: Selk'nam, Yamana, Kawesqar by Martin Gusinde, The Photograph and Australia by Judy Annear, Both Sides of Sunset: Photographing Los Angeles edited by Jane Brown and Marla Hamburg Kennedy and Harry Gruyaert, named after its author.
lead_paragraph: Van Vechten cuts an odd figure as portraitist of the Harlem Renaissance and its successors.

headline.main: Photography: Carl Van Vechten, Cecil Beaton and More

snippet: Van Vechten cuts an odd figure as portraitist of the Harlem Renaissance and its successors.
